cooked: This issue certainly is not limited to actors of chinese nationality, isn’t it ? I am familiar with several projects based in other countries who practice the same form of appropriation. I am sure there exists projects based in china who have self certified exercising due diligence. I suggest keeping the whole picture in mind.
